title: Advent of Code
content: Solutions to the annual advent of code challenge

title: Worms CLI
content: A CLI for managing Worms Armageddon configuration formats and replays.

title: Player Rank
content: A C# library to track Elo rankings of players in multiplayer games.

title: Worms Hub
content: An API to upload, process and show stats about replays for Worms Armageddon

title: Raspberry Pi K8s Cluster
content: The configuration for my home Kubernetes cluster. The cluster is made up of 4 Raspberry Pis and runs a variety of services including Jellyfin, PiHole, Home Assistant, Grafana, Loki and Prometheus.

title: Nest Exporter
content: A Prometheus metrics exporter for Nest thermostats using the Google Device Access API.

title: Music Genre Classifier
content: My final year dissertation. Automatically determine the genre of a piece of music by analysing its waveform.

title: Fangames.co.uk
content: A website I built and maintained in my teenage years. The site was dedicated to making games celebrating the click and point adventures of the 90s. The site enjoyed a cult following and was once mentioned in PC Gamer magazine.
